name: FlipACoinExperiment
description:
(fullscreen recomended)

This game is an experiment with flipping coin. You can flip a coin how many times you want(or how many times your pc can handle it), and see it on graph. With more flips it will lean more towards 50%/50%.         

Press enter to flip coins.                                             

   

                                                                                                                                                  - by Lukas Podhorny
